snippet.title: The Stone of Madness Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
The Stone of Madness is a real-time stealth tactics game set in a Spanish monastery, where you play as five inmates looking to escape. It's coming to PC and consoles in early 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #stoneofmadness #gamescom
